content.title: TikTok's Newest Trend #AustenTok Celebrates Author Jane Austen's Iconic Legacy
Is Austen finding new fans on… Tiktok? - Jane Austen articles and blog

results:
Based on the search results, I can provide you with information about #AustenTok and its connection to Jane Austen's works, including Emma, on TikTok:

#AustenTok is a niche subset of BookTok that discusses, analyzes, and celebrates the works of author Jane Austen.(no content)The hashtag has reached 16 million views, though more recent data suggests even higher engagement levels, with the AustenTok hashtag having over 44.6 million views as of late 2023.

This corner of the web is dedicated to all things Jane Austen, whether it's discussing her film adaptations, her unfinished novels, or even her leading heroines.(no content)If you're a fan of Pride and Prejudice, Emma, or Sense and Sensibility, this represents a niche TikTok obsession within the broader BookTok community.

On AustenTok, users are likely to find videos that range from "Which Austen Leading Lady Are You?" to rankings of the Austen men to videos dissecting recent adaptations of Austen's works.(no content)There are also videos about making period-accurate costumes and discovering modern retellings of Austen's stories.(no content)Jane Austen is one of the leaders of the pack when it comes to classic literature finding new audiences on TikTok, and many users who participate in #BookTok are also active fans of #AustenTok, creating a collision of literary niches on TikTok.

The search results show that Emma, along with Austen's other works, is actively discussed and celebrated within this thriving online community dedicated to Jane Austen's literary legacy.
